Text.Page:
We need to secure more medical supplies.

Can you help us out, ?"I'm on it."

Thank you.

You should go to High Elder Verikam in Highwatch and ask if they have any to spare.

I see.

We'll support the federation as much as we can, of course. But I'm afraid that it won't be enough.

I'll send out searchers and have them gather herbs.

You should gather some yourself on your way back to the camp."I'll do that."

Thank you so much.

With the supplies from Highwatch, this should be enough to patch up our troops."I hope they get well soon."
